featured.text: Guests may enjoy facilities such as free Wi-Fi, mobile charging, and even a soundless alarm system that raises the sleeping guests into a seated position while gradually brightening the lights.

definition.zh_def: 充電，為設備或電池提供電力以恢復其能量。
definition.en_def: The act of supplying power to a device or battery to restore its energy.
definition.example: I need to start charging my phone before it runs out of battery.
